original_text: Then said Ziba unto the king, According to all that my lord the king hath commanded his servant, so shall thy servant do. As for Mephibosheth, said the king, he shall eat at my table, as one of the king's sons.
korean_text: 시바가 왕께 아뢰되 내 주 왕께서 모든 일을 종에게 명령하신 대로 종이 준행하겠나이다 하니라 므비보셋은 왕자 중 하나처럼 왕의 상에서 먹으니라

sentences.original_text: Then said Ziba unto the king
According to all that my lord the king hath commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주 왕께서 명하신 모든 것에 따라

sentences.original_text: he shall eat at my table
as one of the king's sons
